data.title: Mid-City Security District
data.meta_description: Police Patrols in Mid City New Orleans
data.text:
Contact Information: NOPD Fifth District

3900 North Claiborne Ave.

New Orleans, LA 70117

(504) 658-6050

Link: https://www.facebook.com/NOPDFifth

MAX meetings, led by the senior leadership in each NOPD district, provide a synopsis of police activity for the week, including trends in crime and crime reduction strategies that are being implemented. These meetings also include a discussion on all other topics for which that District has responsibility. The data supporting these MAX meetings is available online to improve transparency and accountability.

MAX meetings are held once a week in each District and are open to the public. Additionally, the meeting can be viewed via livestream on the district's Facebook page.

This meeting is open to cancellation due to holidays, special events or other circumstances. Any cancellations will be announced as early in advance of the meeting as possible through subscriber email and district Facebook page.

Contact Information: NOPD Second District station

3401 Broadway St.

New Orleans, LA 70125

504-658-6020

Link: https://www.facebook.com/NOPDSecond

NOTICE: During the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, in-person MAX meetings have been canceled. Citizens can watch MAX meetings live via the First District's Facebook page (www.facebook.comâ€¦). In-person MAX meetings will resume once COVID restrictions have been lifted.

Contact Information: Email Captain Sandra Contreras at srcontreras@nola.gov for Zoom invitation.

New Orleans Neighborhood Police Anti-Crime Council meetings, or NONPACC, occur monthly and are attended by the District Commander and other district personnel. These meetings provide community members with an opportunity to voice their concerns directly to the district captain.

This meeting is open to cancellation due to holidays, special events or other circumstances. Any cancellations will be announced as early in advance of the meeting as possible through subscriber email and district Facebook page.
